task.title: Test the Circuit
task.shortdesc: How to test the circuit by checking for sound.

substep.cmd: Plug a 1/4 inch cable from the output jack to an amp.
Turn the amp on and crank the volume.
Turn the knob of the volume pot all the way clockwise.
Tap a screwdriver on the humbucker to test if sound is coming through
Using your phone, or any music playing device, play a song and hold the speaker up to the humbucker. You should hear the song playing through the amp.

With the song still playing against the humbucker, turn the knob of the volume pot counter-clockwise. You should hear the song get quieter as you turn, going completely mute when the knob is turned fully counter-clockwise.

step.cmd: If the expected outcomes listed in the previous three steps are not met, consult the troubleshooting guide.
